llm_command:
kubectl apply -n frontend -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: allow-recommendationservice
  namespace: frontend
spec:
  podSelector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  ingress:
  - from:
    - podSelector:
        matchLabels:
          app: recommendationservice
    ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 8080
EOF
output:
apiVersion: v1
items: []
kind: List
metadata:
  resourceVersion: ""
